text: Sione Faletau (born 20 June 1988) is a Tonga rugby union player. His usual position is as a Prop, and he currently plays for Bristol Bears. ==References== ==External links== *itsrugby.co.uk Profile Category:1988 births Category:Living people Category:Tongan rugby union players Category:Tonga international rugby union players Category:Rugby union props
title: Sione Faletau
